name: loxt
description: Loxt is a simple and easy console logger of less than 1kb in size with 0 dependencies.

scripts.build: esbuild --minify --bundle --outfile=index.js --tsconfig=tsconfig.json --format=cjs src/index.ts && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && esbuild --minify --bundle --outfile=es/index.js --tsconfig=tsconfig.json --format=esm src/index.ts && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declarationDir es

author: AngelNext
